scripts.css:slim:watch: onchange './_scss/**/*.scss' './_php/**/*.php' --initial --poll 25 --delay 0 --await-write-finish 25 -- onerror "npm run css:slim:dev" --title "css:slim:watch" --message "build failed" --sound mute
scripts.css: npm-run-all --print-label --silent --sequential css:sass css:postcss:tailwind css:postcss:autoprefixer css:critical css:libs
scripts.css:watch: onchange './_html/**/*.html' './_scss/**/*.scss' './_php/**/*.php' './_libs/**/*.css' --initial --poll 25 --delay 0 --await-write-finish 25 -- onerror "echo \"â³ css:dev\" && npm run css:dev" --title "css:watch" --message "build failed" --sound mute
scripts.css:postcss:tailwind: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" cross-env TAILWIND_MODE=build postcss --use @tailwindcss/postcss cssnano --no-map --no-autoprefixer --output ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.css ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.css
scripts.css:critical: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" from-env critical %DOMAIN --width $npm_package_config_critical_width --height $npm_package_config_critical_height --ignore-atrule "@font-face" --ignore-rule ".foo" --userAgent "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; Googlebot/2.1; +http://www.google.com/bot.html)" > ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle-critical.css
scripts.css:libs: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" find ./_libs -name "*.css" | xargs cat > ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/libs.css && cat ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.css >> ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/libs.css && mv ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/libs.css ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.css
scripts.js:slim:watch: onchange './_js/**/*.js' --initial --poll 250 --delay 250 --await-write-finish 500 -- onerror "npm run js:slim:dev" --title "js:slim:watch" --message "build failed" --sound mute
scripts.js: npm-run-all --print-label --silent --sequential js:vite js:minify js:babel js:libs js:tests
scripts.js:dev: npm-run-all --print-label --silent --sequential js:vite js:babel js:libs js:tests browsersync:reload
scripts.js:watch: onchange './_js/**/*.js' './_libs/**/*.js' --initial --poll 250 --delay 250 --await-write-finish 500 -- onerror "npm run js:dev" --title "js:watch" --message "build failed" --sound mute
scripts.js:vite: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" vite build --logLevel error
scripts.js:browserify:none: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" browserify ./_js/script.js --outfile ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.js --debug -g [ browserify-css --minify=true --stripComments=true ] --transform babelify
scripts.js:browserify: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" browserify ./_js/script.js --outfile ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.js --debug -g [ browserify-css --minify=true --stripComments=true ] -t [ babelify --global --only [ _js node_modules/photoswipe node_modules/define-more-here ] --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ]
scripts.js:browserify:global: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" browserify ./_js/script.js --outfile ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.js --debug -g [ browserify-css --minify=true --stripComments=true ] -g [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ]
scripts.js:libs: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" find ./_libs -name "*.js" | xargs cat | terser --output ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/libs.js && cat ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.js >> ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/libs.js && mv ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/libs.js ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/bundle.js
scripts.js:tests:watch: onchange './_tests/_js/**/*.js' --poll 250 --delay 250 --await-write-finish 500 -- onerror "npm run js:tests" --title "js:tests:watch" --message "build failed" --sound mute
scripts.html:watch: onchange './_html/**/*.html' --initial --poll 25 --delay 0 --await-write-finish 25 -- onerror "npm run html:dev" --title "html:watch" --message "build failed" --sound mute
scripts.html:minify: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" html-minifier-next --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --minify-css true --minify-js true --input-dir ./_html --output-dir ./$npm_package_config_build_folder --file-ext html
scripts.html:inline: echo "â³" && command time -f "âœ… (%es)" inline-source --attribute "data-inline" --compress true --root ./$npm_package_config_build_folder ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/index.html > ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/index_inline.html && move-file ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/index_inline.html ./$npm_package_config_build_folder/index.html
scripts.copy:watch: onchange './_assets/**/*.*' './_php/**/*.*' --initial --poll 25 --delay 0 --await-write-finish 25 -- onerror "npm run copy" --title "copy:watch" --message "build failed" --sound mute
scripts.dev:âš¡: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all --print-label --silent --parallel css:slim:watch js:slim:watch browsersync
scripts.prod:full:âš¡: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all --print-label --silent --sequential delete:files copy css js html
scripts.dev:full:âš¡: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all --print-label --silent --parallel copy:watch css:watch js:watch js:tests:watch html:watch browsersync
